source.aa29586c:
#1. Lower Case

brazil = brazil.lower()

#2. Punctuation Removal
import string
punc = string.punctuation
brazil = ''.join([char for char in brazil if char not in punc]) #for loops may be inefficient sometimes
source.d1026870:
#Removing newlines
#strip function does not remove whitespaces from the middle part of the text. It removes white spaces only from the 
#beginnings and end. Let's use replace to get rid of the newlines.

brazil = brazil.replace('\n', ' ')
brazil[:500]
source.340b4039:
# using regular expression to get rid of punctuations:
with open('../input/hackathon/task_1-google_search_txt_files_v2/BR/Brazil-pt-result-29.txt') as g:
    brazil = g.read()

#Normalization
#Lower case

brazil = brazil.lower()

#Removing Punctuation
import re
brazil = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\s]','',brazil) #replacing not a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and whitespaces with ''.
source.168732d3:
#2. nltk

from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
brazil_nltk_word =word_tokenize(brazil)
brazil_nltk_word[:2]
source.65ca08e8:
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

brazil_stopwords_removed = [w for w in brazil_nltk_word if w not in stopwords.words('english')]
brazil_stopwords_removed[:5]
source.210e763a:
from nltk import pos_tag
brazil_pos_tag = pos_tag(brazil_stopwords_removed)
brazil_pos_tag[:5]
source.d415478f:
from nltk import ne_chunk
brazil_named_entity = ne_chunk(brazil_pos_tag)
source.6e6caa0a:
from nltk.stem import LancasterStemmer
from nltk.stem import PorterStemmer

ps = PorterStemmer()
list(map(ps.stem,brazil_stopwords_removed))

source.04f25ae7:
As of June 11, 2020, Brazil was the Latin American country with the highest number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 coronavirus disease, with over 802.8 thousand cases. By state, São Paulo ranked first, with more than 162.5 thousand occurences. 
On June 6, the Brazilian government stopped publishing the accumulated number of cases and deaths in the country, as well as the breakdown by state, and erased the published history. https://www.statista.com/statistics/1103791/brazil-coronavirus-cases-state/
